Hospitality & Dining.title: The Kitch'n Club
Hospitality & Dining.profile: The Kitch'n Club is an indoor pickleball facility and social venue located in Kota Damansara...
role: Event and DJ sound system integration
System tuning and SPL calibration for live programmes

Hospitality & Dining.title: Wedge Range
Hospitality & Dining.profile: Wedge is an indoor golf bar and social club in the heart of Kuala Lumpur Where golf and entertainment collide. Whether you are starting from scratch or playing off scratch, it’s their mission to make golf exciting and accessible to all. Combining state-of-the-art golf technology with the best in music, food and drink, they bring you a social experience that takes the game to a whole new level. Discover a state-of-the-art golfing venue at Wedge Range. With 13 open swing bays, 4 private rooms, a PGA Teaching Academy, and a lively restaurant and bar, they offer a complete, family-friendly golfing experience. Whether it’s casual practice, nights out with friends, or big events, The Range has something for everyone.
focus: Background music for common areas, the speakers has to cover the whole area and match the modern interior design.
Proper speaker placement to improve overall listening experience and sound.

A high quality, commercial sound systems that have the capacity to play background music during the day, provide slightly elevated volume levels during the evening and also capable of delivering a robust nightclub quality sound over the weekend.

Hospitality & Dining.title: Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill
Hospitality & Dining.profile: Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill is the city’s most sought-after dining destination and is only a short flight away from other great Asian cities. Featuring an exquisite menu inspired by one of London’s most iconic restaurants, Savoy Grill, only the finest ingredients presented with culinary flair from the highly skilled, Gordon Ramsay-trained team is served. Diners can look forward to savouring prime cuts of meat dry-aged in-house and Chef Ramsay’s most desirable dishes.
focus: A high quality, commercial sound systems that have the capacity to play background music during the day, provide slightly elevated volume levels during the evening and also capable of delivering a robust nightclub quality sound over the weekend.
The speakers model was chosen based on the restaurant needs for different dining and club requirements. While it has to accommodate the interior design with easy installation.

Hospitality & Dining.title: GravyBaby
Hospitality & Dining.location: 391, Chulia St, Georgetown, 10200 George Town, Penang, Malaysia
Hospitality & Dining.profile: GravyBaby is a magnificent bar and restaurant situated in the hearts of KLCC, Jalan, Damansara, P Ramlee and soon all over the world! While the unique setting of GravyBaby is inviting, the main reason to visit is the sumptuous food. Their UK renowned chef has produced a classic, a la carte menu of the highest quality which includes some tried and tested Cocktails and Pies. The GravyBaby a la carte menu will change seasonally so you can enjoy a new gastronomic experience throughout the year.

Hospitality & Dining.title: Marc Residences
Hospitality & Dining.profile: Located at Marc Residence, WIP delivers a dynamic mix of Western, Asian, and Indian cuisines complemented by innovative drinks and upbeat ambience. Recognized as one of KL’s go-to destinations for great eats, drinks, and parties, it brings together culinary creativity, modern design, and immersive sound to create an unforgettable social experience.
focus: Dedicated zone control for seamless ambiance transitions
Independent SPL mapping for precise volume management
Sound design aligned with brand atmosphere and energy

Hospitality & Dining.title: Souled Out
Hospitality & Dining.profile: SOULed OUT began in 1996 as a small neighbourhood café in Mont Kiara and moved to her current premise in Desa Sri Hartamas in December 1999. So named as each and every staff member puts their heart and soul into providing her patrons with the best. It is part of the SOUL Society Group that comprises of other iconic outlets such as Tujo Bar-sserie & Grill and WIP. More than a decade on and having served over 5 million patrons, SOULed OUT has matured into an assured personality with a fun loving spirit. An eclectic mix Local, Western and Northern Indian food and beverages make it a place for friends and family to foster the spirit of friendship and camaraderie. All the familiar trappings have been retained albeit with a refreshed look and feel of the hardware. The cosiness of the outlets is crafted to cater to affairs from a simple family dinner to a night out with friends. Whatever it is, an encounter with SOULed OUT is always ‘as good as a hug’. SOULed OUT’s accolades include ‘Outlet of the Year’, ‘Best Resto-Bar 2013-2014’ at the prestigious Hospitality Asia Platinum Awards (HAPA), 1st Runner Up for the Iron Bartender Challenge and 2nd Runner Up for Best Teamwork at the HoReCa School of Excellence 2013.

Restaurant & Outdoor Zones: Invisible line array integration for LED screen and dining area

Hospitality & Dining.title: Berjaya Cafe
Hospitality & Dining.location: Level 14 West, Berjaya Times Square Hotel, Kuala Lumpur
Hospitality & Dining.profile: Berjaya Cafe is the vegetarian lover’s dining paradise. A sumptuous plant-based menu including signature dishes: nasi lemak and rendang pizza. Sustainable ingredients and a wholesome selection of dishes, they can assure your guests will savour only the best in a meatless gastronomic experience carefully curated by the best chefs in town. From breakfast to dinner as well as a special afternoon-tea, Berjaya Cafe brings you the ambiance of a contemporary dining restaurant overlooking the skyline and magnificent city view of Kuala Lumpur. Lending to the current trend of lifestyle that focuses not only on health and well-being, we encourage all diners to be more mindful about the impact to the earth from consuming meat; sustainable eating is about choosing foods that are healthy to our environment and bodies. Berjaya Cafe is inspired by the Founder and Executive Chairman of Berjaya Corporation Berhad, Tan Sri Dato’ Seri Vincent Tan Chee Yioun’s ethos: “Every individual can play a role to help Mother Earth, even in a small way, by being a vegetarian”. The food production process from farm to plate can account for around 30% of all global greenhouse gas emissions which contributes to global warming. Reducing meat consumption even slightly in your everyday diet will have a positive impact to your health and the planet.

Hospitality & Dining.title: Sapore Italian Restaurant
Hospitality & Dining.profile: Sapore is an Italian, Spanish-Mediterranean Restaurant located at Ampang, the neighbouring city at Kuala Lumpur. Located within 5-10 km away from Suria KLCC, the busy Changkat Bukit Bintang or the happening TREC, rest assured that driving distance of 15 – 20 minutes within the KL area, and volla, you get to enjoy wonderful Italian Spanish food at Sapore. Sapore means flavours in Italian. At Sapore, we held an interesting slogan – “Serving you Artisan Food and Fine Wine”, simply because we highlight the authentic taste of Italian and Spanish food. We are all about – Jamon Iberico, Tapas, and Wine. Our Signature dishes are Roasted Octopus, Suckling Pig, Dry-Aged Grain-Fed T-Bone, Iberico Pork Seafood Paella, Tapas, Cold Cuts, Cheese, Pizza, Pasta, Ibérico Abanico Loin. They have a list of fine imported wines as well. Originally from Bari, the capital city of southern Italy’s Puglia region, Chef Fabio Ruggiero, the restaurateur and executive chef, will delight you with great Italian and Spanish food. Come over to ‘Sapore’ (taste) our classic Italian and Spanish dishes, as they enjoy bringing people together through food. Their chefs might also surprise you with some dishes off the menu!
focus: We provided a simple and easy-to-operate sound system without neglecting high audio quality. Frog-is is the perfect solution for Sapore’s patrons and their staff.

Notes: Frog-is’s AMP4D is an all-in-one 4-channel Class D DSP amplifier. Integrated with USB & Bluetooth media player, this amplifier is a complete control centre for Pop Pizza’s demanding audio needs. Not only that, but we also have the option of 2 presets for 2.1 or 4.1 setups with a crossover between the tops and subwoofers.

Hospitality & Dining.title: Pop Pizza
Hospitality & Dining.profile: Step into the world 80’s Pizza where things are on-the-go and fun! Taste pizza from the heart of New York City where every dream is possible. Try authentic Italian flavours mixed with incredible recipes for pizza made just the way you like it, whether its with dashes of soulful salsa or smoky barbeque. Sit back, hang loose and enjoy yourself in this 80’s style diner decorated with neon lights, great service and famous rock n’ roll music.
focus: We provided a simple and easy-to-operate sound system without neglecting high audio quality. Frog-is is the perfect solution for Pop Pizza’s patrons and their staff.

Hospitality & Dining.title: Quivo
Hospitality & Dining.location: Mid Valley Southkey, Johor Bahru, Malaysia
Hospitality & Dining.profile: A hidden gem. QUIVO is a Mediterranean-influenced restaurant and bar in chic atmosphere and great service. Fresh, crisp flavours of margaritas, falafel that evokes the Mediterranean street feel plays in tune to sublime and creamy risotto that may have come straight from Italy! Come and dive straight into the depth of Mediterranean cuisine, mingle around you never know who you will find!

Hospitality & Dining.title: The Iron Fairies
Hospitality & Dining.profile: The Iron Fairies KL in TREC is set to become a magical place for night-goers to come out and play. One of KL’s most expensive bars being built to date, it’s a venue where the imagination can run wild as you take in the intricate detail of the hand-cast designs by Ashley Sutton himself. A cult brand, The Iron Fairies origins’ draw back to the story books written by Australian iron ore miner-turned-interior designer Ashley Sutton who escaped into a fantasy world of fairies which then inspired the tale that immortalised into what is The Iron Fairies bars today.The Butterfly Room is where 50, 000 handmade butterflies hang from the ceiling and a DJ on Friday & Saturday is setting the tone accordingly with music ranging from old-school house to techno from midnight till 5am. Think along the style of Joey Negro, Frankie Knuckles, Derrick Carter, and so on. The Fairy Garden encapsulates the life & soul of The Iron Fairies. With different areas for seating and dancing reinforced with a powerful sound system by K-array, this rooftop is the ultimate adult’s playground that comes alive once you step inside. The DJ there assumes full responsibility in setting the mood for this area; they are bringing the best of house, disco, techno and every sub genre in between with influence from DJs such as Honey Dijon, Peggy Gou, and Hunee. Three floors starting from the enchanting outdoor rooftop Fairy Garden, heading down to the dark enclosed Butterfly Room and then finally deep underground into the cast iron space resembling an iron mine with a mythical twist, The Iron Fairies Kuala Lumpur is primed to be the flagship jewel of TREC occupying three units and two roof terraces which all comes together to unfold a visual story in each unique space.

Live Band with PRO AUDIO Speakers: K-array KN6 ×10 – High-technology self-powered point/line source speaker
Frog-is FP12P ×4 – Compact passive full-range speaker 12″

Hospitality & Dining.title: Brazzo Rivercity
Hospitality & Dining.profile: Brazzo Rivercity Batu Pahat blends a relaxed family-friendly atmosphere with an evening live-music energy, creating a versatile dining destination for casual gatherings, celebrations and social nights. The venue pairs Western classics and Asian favourites with chilled draft beers and a curated selection of international wines, supported by a sound system designed to transition seamlessly from background ambience to live performance.
focus: Clear front-of-house sound reinforcement for dining and live music
Dedicated karaoke room audio with controlled low-end impact
Flexible system tuning for day-to-night operation

Hospitality & Dining.title: Atmosphere 360
Hospitality & Dining.context: Fine dining · KL Tower, Kuala Lumpur
Hospitality & Dining.profile: Atmosphere 360 is a modern and elegant revolving restaurant situated 282m above ground level located at the tallest tower in Southeast Asia – Menara Kuala Lumpur. The restaurant is furnished in a spaceship-like atmosphere with its magnificent view and starry fiber optic ceiling lights that offers a truly unforgettable and luxurious culinary experience.
focus: Design and install a system for the background audio and live band audio system, great for dining experience and yet invisible as every single interior design are highly appreciated.Design and install a system for the background audio and live band audio system, great for dining experience and yet invisible as every single interior design are highly appreciated.
Consistent and immersive background music during the revolving of the dining seats to ensure the diners has an amazing experience while accompanied by the panoramic scenic view of Kuala Lumpur.

Nextrend Systems chooses Amina invisible speaker to fill the luxury space with exceptional audio with optical fibre twinkle starry filled ceiling for dining & live sound settings. Amina is the perfect sound solution for this space because it provides a full-bandwidth 180-degree dispersion pattern, incredible smooth coverage throughout the space.

With both full-bandwidth 180-degree dispersion and the incoherent-phase waveform generated by a VPT (Vibration Panel Technology), consistent sound coverage can be easily achieved with next to no variation in frequency across the entire space.

Two sound systems were built – one for background dining music, the other for live band music. The system switches automatically between the two systems, transferring from background music to live music instantly without any lapse.

Sound System: QSC ADS 82 – Acoustic designed surface mount weather-resistant loudspeaker system

Hospitality & Dining.profile: Soaring 188 meters above the heart of Phnom Penh’s business district, Rosewood Phnom Penh occupies the top 14 floors of Vattanac Capital Tower, the city’s most iconic modern structure and a symbol of the new Cambodia.

Hotels & Lounges.title: PARKROYAL COLLECTION
Hotels & Lounges.profile: PARKROYAL COLLECTION Kuala Lumpur is designed with the environment and wellness in mind for the modern conscious travellers. Gorgeous greenery, earthy tones and sleek wooden finishes within their hotel make it the perfect hideaway from skyscrapers, shopping malls and city streets teeming with activity.
focus: Lobby – Background music for common areas, speakers to match the modern interior design.
Common area – Proper speaker placement to improve overall listening experience and sound.

Ballrooms – Background music and small public address system for events. A sound system that can handle high music levels during full hall banquet. Softer levels in a separate partition where guests can comfortably conduct a meeting or discussion.
Customize speakers coloured to accommodate the natural wood surface of Grand Ballroom.

Hotels & Lounges.title: Sheraton Imperial Hotel
Hotels & Lounges.profile: Nestled in the city center and just steps away from the city monorail and LRT lines, the hotel offers seamless access to Kuala Lumpur’s main attractions making it just minutes away from the city’s best shopping and dining venues.

Hotels & Lounges.title: The Saujana Hotel
Hotels & Lounges.profile: The Saujana Hotel Kuala Lumpur in Malaysia is a 5 star resort style hotel that sits on 160 hectares of lush tropical forest and gardens with lakeside view. Taking its name from the old Malay expression “sejauh di sana” which means – as far as the eye can see – this 355 rooms resort with two adjoining 18-hole championship gold courses is an idyllic haven for business and pleasure only minutes from the city in Shah Alam.

Sound System: K-array KT2 – 2″ audio speaker carved from aluminum

Hotels & Lounges.title: Mandarin Oriental Hotel
Hotels & Lounges.profile: The Mandarin Oriental in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia opened in 1998 and is the largest Mandarin Oriental hotel having 632 rooms, 41 suites and 51 apartments. It is located next to Petronas Tower, offers 6 restaurants and 2 bars, a fitness centre, spa and an infinity edge ourdoor pool with views over the near located city centre park. It has been rated as the best hotel in Kuala Lumpur several times and as one of the 100 best hotels in Malaysia. The Five-Star hotel is nationwide famous for its personal service, the different culinary offers by international chefs and the room views over the illuminated Petronas towers by night.

Hotels & Lounges.title: Hilton Hotel
Hotels & Lounges.profile: Located in the heart of KL Sentral, Hilton Hotel is a landmark destination where business travellers, weekend guests and fine-dining enthusiasts cross paths in a vibrant, contemporary setting. The interiors blend warm hospitality with modern luxury — open lobby spaces, refined lounges and signature restaurants all flowing together with a consistent design language. For this project, the goal was to create an audio experience that feels effortless: present, but never intrusive. Using Amina AIW1 and AIW3 invisible speakers, we delivered a fully concealed sound solution that preserves the clean architectural lines of the hotel while bathing key guest areas in soft, evenly balanced background music. Whether guests are checking in, enjoying a casual conversation, or moving between facilities, the sound remains smooth, calming and beautifully uniform across the entire space.

Hotels & Lounges.title: Apricot Hotel
Hotels & Lounges.profile: Apricot Hotel is a boutique luxury property in the heart of Hanoi, blending contemporary elegance with classic artistic influences. The brief called for a high-quality background music system that would enhance the ambience without introducing any visible hardware. Using Amina LFi2T invisible speakers, we delivered a fully concealed sound solution that preserves the hotel’s refined interiors while providing soft, evenly distributed audio across guest areas.

Residential & Private Cinema.title: Avara Seputeh
Residential & Private Cinema.profile: When comes to hitting the target right on the dot, no residential development offers such value as Avara Seputeh. A freehold development neighbouring 5 urban developments – Mid Valley City, KL Eco City, Bangsar South, Bandar Malaysia, and KL Sentral. Avara Seputeh is the place to call home.Optimises space for style and comfort in all its units. They have 3 artistic yet practical layout design plans, whether it is 1, 2 or 3 rooms to suit your needs. Luxurious interiors fuse comfort with an elegant style. And stylish living areas perfect spaces for entertaining. High-quality finishes blend effortlessly from beautiful kitchens which shape the heart of these designer homes to indulgent premium appliances.Turn up the heat at the state-of-the-art gymnasium, or take a dip in the infinity lap pool. Unwind with a cold beverage in the sun lounge while watching over the kids as they enjoy splashing in the awesome water playground. Your private events and parties will be the talk of the town. Imagine dining amidst a beautifully landscaped garden while enjoying sterling city skyline views.Live high, live well, live posh in an iconic residence created with nature in mind. It is a prestigious enclave with warm and sophisticated accents to enhance comfort living. Its uncompromised aesthetics incorporate a modern and organic concept. Blending features and finishing in an interplay of the stylish kinetic facade, ripples in the wind to form a beautiful piece of art.

Residential & Private Cinema.title: ARIA Residence
Residential & Private Cinema.profile: Aria Kuala Lumpur rises majestically from the very heart of Malaysia’s bustling capital city. 2 Towers with 592 units in all, ranging from one and up to three bedrooms. All residences are exclusive and private, 2 lifts serving 2–3 units only, offering exclusive concierge service and luxurious facilities area of approximately 65,000 sq. ft.Within 1km traveling distance to both proposed KLCC East and Conlay MRT station, Aria KLCC’s most desirable address and is the epitome of upscale urban living.

Inspired by the Maison’s unique identity and heritage, each jewelry and watch collection tells a story with universal meaning to express a poetic way of life.

Corporate / Government / Enterprise.location: Tzu Chi International School, Bukit Jalil, Malaysia
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: Tzu Chi International School (TCISKL) offers the Cambridge curriculum together with Tzu Chi’s humanistic lessons on a 7.67-acre campus. Corporate / Government / Enterprise.title: Iskandar Malaysia
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: Iskandar Malaysia, formerly known as Iskandar Development Region and South Johor Economic Region, is the main southern development corridor in Johor, Malaysia. It was established on 8 November 2006.

Corporate / Government / Enterprise.title: Etiqa Insurance and Takaful
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: Etiqa is the insurance and takaful business of the Malaysian banking group Maybank. It offers life and general insurance as well as family and general takaful products through its 14,000 agents, 30 branches and 450 Maybank branches using the bancassurance model. Etiqa Insurance is one of the top conventional insurers in Malaysia by gross premiums written; while Etiqa Takaful is the takaful market leader with 47 percent and 21 percent market shares in general and family takaful respectively in 2014.

Corporate / Government / Enterprise.title: Lendlease Site Office
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: Lendlease is a leading international property and infrastructure group, with approximately 12,000 employees internationally. They combine their core capabilities of development, construction, investment and property management across the property value chain to offer innovative and integrated solutions for their clients. Headquartered in Sydney but with over 35 years’ experience in Malaysia, they are proud to have delivered some of the most iconic and award-winning projects locally and globally. Every day, millions of people around the world live, work, shop and play via an asset created by Lendlease.

Corporate / Government / Enterprise.title: Menara JCorp Lendlease
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: Lendlease is a leading international property and infrastructure group, with approximately 12,000 employees internationally. Corporate / Government / Enterprise.title: Petronas IO Centre
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: PETRONAS, short form Petroliam Nasional Berhad (National Petroleum, Limited), is a Malaysia oil and gas company that was founded on 17 Auguest 1974. Wholly owned by the Government of Malaysia, the corporation is vested with the entire oil and gas resources in Malaysia and is entrusted with the responsibility of developing and adding value to these resources. Petronas is ranked among Fortune Global 500’s largest corporations, 75th largest company and 12th most profitable company in the world. The I/O Centre main function as a command centre as a centralized monitoring hub for global refinery operation. In this case, video conference communication systems are crucial for 24/7 communication hub with each operation centre globally. So, as far as it concerns, the voice intelligibility is the highest priority.

Corporate / Government / Enterprise.title: BAE Systems
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: BAE Systems plc is a British multinational defence security and aerospace company. Its headquarters are in London in the United Kingdom and it has operations worldwide and one of its branches in Menara Binjai Malaysia.

Corporate / Government / Enterprise.title: SYABAS Facility
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: Syabas, better known as Syarikat Bekalan Air Selangor, is the sole provider of water supply and distributor for over 7 million customers in Selangor and Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur.

Corporate / Government / Enterprise.title: Islamic Museum
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: Interest in Islamic art has grown enormously in recent years. Reflecting this awareness, in December 1998 Malaysia became home to Southeast Asia’s largest museum of Islamic art. The building occupies 30,000 square metres, situated amid the leafy surroundings of central Kuala Lumpur’s Lake Gardens.

Corporate / Government / Enterprise.title: 1Malaysia for Youth iM4U
Corporate / Government / Enterprise.profile: 1Malaysia for Youth, usually stylised as iM4U, was an initiative of the former Malaysian government of Barisan Nasional (BN) led by Najib Razak. It was created to encourage the volunteerism among Malaysian youth. The program launched in July 2012 and in January 2013 the first group of twenty iM4U ambassadors was announced. IM4U became dormant and was dissolved after the downfall of BN government in the 2018 general election.

gallery.description: Grand arrival and lobby spaces with low-level background music, tuned to complement the marble, glass and lighting while keeping check-in conversation clear and relaxed.

gallery.label: Lounge & all-day dining
gallery.description: Lounge and all-day dining zones with evenly distributed architectural loudspeakers, delivering a smooth musical bed that can transition from breakfast calm to evening energy.

gallery.label: Signature restaurant
gallery.description: Restaurant interior with carefully aimed audio, balancing intimacy at each table with a cohesive soundscape across the entire room.

gallery.label: Ballroom & event spaces
gallery.description: Ballroom and event areas supported by a flexible system capable of both elegant background music and higher-SPL event playback for galas, weddings and corporate functions.

gallery.label: Pre-function & circulation zones
gallery.description: Pre-function corridors and circulation spaces with seamless audio transitions, so guests experience a continuous, coherent sound field moving between rooms.

gallery.label: View-facing guest areas
gallery.description: Guest-facing zones overlooking the city, where subtle background music is voiced to sit beneath the visual drama of the skyline and architectural views.

handlebar-bar.galleryHighlightDescription: Casual bar and grill at Lock Road in Singapore, where a relaxed, industrial interior is supported by a compact sound system tuned for background playlists, live sport and late-night conversation.

gallery.label: Main bar & dining floor
gallery.description: Primary bar and dining area with evenly distributed loudspeakers, voiced for clear speech and comfortable music levels across high tables and communal seating.

gallery.label: Indoor seating & feature wall
gallery.description: Feature wall and indoor seating zone with slightly lifted levels for a livelier vibe around the bar, while keeping the overall mix smooth and non-fatiguing.

gallery.label: Perimeter & corner seating
gallery.description: Perimeter tables and corner pockets tuned with softer levels, giving guests space for longer hangs and conversation while still staying inside the overall soundscape.

hilton-hotel.galleryHighlightDescription: Urban luxury hotel in Kuala Lumpur Sentral, where discreet architectural audio supports a calm, polished atmosphere across lobby, dining and lounge spaces.

gallery.label: Hotel exterior & context
gallery.description: Overall view of Hilton Kuala Lumpur within the Sentral precinct, setting the scene for integrated audio across key guest-facing spaces.

gallery.label: Lobby & guest circulation
gallery.description: Lobby and circulation areas with subtle, evenly distributed background music that enhances the ambience while keeping check-in and guest interaction clear.

the-iron-fairies.galleryHighlightDescription: A cult nightlife destination at TREC where theatrical interiors, layered lighting and fantasy-inspired detailing are matched with a powerful, tightly controlled sound system across three distinct floors.

gallery.label: Fairy Garden rooftop
gallery.description: Open-air rooftop zone where the sound system is tuned for high-energy house and disco, keeping the dance floor alive while surrounding seating stays comfortably listenable.

gallery.label: Butterfly Room atmosphere
gallery.description: Enclosed Butterfly Room with dense, immersive sound that supports late-night DJ sets while still preserving clarity for vocals and melodic content.

gallery.label: Live band & performance zone
gallery.description: Stage and live-performance area driven by K-array and Frog-is systems, calibrated for punchy low end and articulate mids so bands and DJs translate cleanly at club levels.

gallery.label: Bar & circulation paths
gallery.description: Bar and circulation paths wrapped in a consistent sound field, so guests moving between rooms experience a seamless shift in level and tone without harsh hotspots.

gallery.label: Multi-level soundscape
gallery.description: Multi-level interior where each zone is independently controlled yet voiced to share the same sonic signature, from underground rooms to rooftop garden.

the-kitch-n-club.galleryHighlightDescription: Court-side spectators, gamers, and nightlife guests share a single audio experience that has been tuned with the same care as a luxury fragrance: precise for competitive play, cinematic for night programmes, and seamlessly even across every viewing position. The sound field is sculpted for clarity, warmth and impact, so the venue can move effortlessly from league-level focus to late-night social energy without ever feeling harsh, chaotic, or fatiguing.

gallery.label: Courtside acoustic field
gallery.description: From the main court, the sound feels quietly assertive rather than overtly loud — a tailored blend of intelligibility and low-end weight that keeps calls, rallies, and commentary effortlessly clear above the music. Courtside seating, social rail positions and gaming zones all sit inside the same carefully shaped coverage, so no guest ever feels off-axis or outside the experience. It is hospitality-led performance sound: immersive, precise and composed, with the gentle polish you would expect from a luxury maison rather than a typical sports venue.

gallery.label: Architectural integration & night energy
gallery.description: Along the extended court zone, architectural loudspeakers and subwoofers disappear into timber, glass and lighting lines, preserving a clean, gallery-like visual language. The system is voiced to deliver club-grade dynamics when the room shifts into DJ mode, yet remains refined and low-fatigue at background levels for coaching blocks or social afternoons. Time alignment, level calibration and preset-driven control mean operators can move from training, to match, to night programme with a single recall — maintaining the same luxurious tonal signature at every setting.
